datafield.subfield: Institute for Neutron Physics and Reactor Technology (INR), Karlsruhe Institute of Technology (KIT), Eggenstein-Leopoldshafen, Germany
Mechanical testing of the IFMIF HFTM-DC prototype during operation in the HELOKA-LP helium loop

• external instrumentation: 40 strain gage sensors (temperature corrected) • and 12 digital dial indicators. • safety successfully confirmed (pressure test at 0.545 MPa g @ RT). • measured strains agree with FEM simulation studies. • measured deformations and surface strains almost completely reversible → no plastic deformation. • maximum measured deflection of 8.5 mm during an asymmetric heated run.
